attributes.action: confiscate houses and goods 'belonging' to the bankers in order to repay the monumental loans (so called bailout) they recived from the taxpayer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is our belief that the top management and directors of banks that have recieved public funds should have their multi-million pound estates confiscated and sold, to go towards repayment of their debts, so the public and the publics children dont have to pay more tax for decades to come.
